mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO FRND(MBR_NO, FRND_PHONE_NO,FRND_NAME, FRND_REG_DATE) VALUES
( #{frnd.mbrNo},#{frnd.frndPhoneNo},#{frnd.frndName},now() )
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE MBR_NO=VALUES(MBR_NO)M FRND_PHONE_NO=VALUES(FRND_PHONE_NO)
mapper.select: select a.MBR_NO as mbrNo, a.FRND_PHONE_NO as frndPhoneNo, a.FRND_NAME as frndName, b.MBR_NAME as mbrName from FRND a, MBR b where a.MBR_NO=b.MBR_NO and a.FRND_PHONE_NO=#{value} limits 1
select a.MBR_NO as mbrNo, a.FRND_PHONE_NO as frndPhoneNo, a.FRND_NAME as frndName, b.FRND_REG_DATE as frndRegDate from FRND where MBR_NO=#{value}
